column4: i just need help configuring pure-ftpd
don't think i ever used pure
is vsftp easier? is there a gui to configure users?
not sure if its easier or whatnot.. i think it's way more popular though
is there a gui to configure users?
don't care if there's a gui, so idk :P
you don't like cli do you?
you know, it's not a bad thing to get used to if you're going to stick to this linux thing
system/ftp users are configured in parallel quite easily from command line
i know, i just dont want to burn myself out on it.
to answer your question, no there isn't a gui for vsftpd, here's a thorough tutorial though: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=518293
thank you. ill give it a shot
never uninstalled pureftp and reinstalled vsftpd so idk.. looks like vsftpd is already installed
